metadata.title: CVE-2022-37609 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Prototype pollution vulnerability in beautify-web js-beautify 1.13.7 viathe name variable in options.js.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'bundled deps handled by upstream in new versions').
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
node-js-beautify package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
